title: MedicalRecordAnalysis
description: A configuration file used in the analysis of medical records.

Converter.description: The converter to use to create the flat file dataset.

MinVisits.description: The minimum number of unique dates a patient must have records for in order for their visit data to be saved.

MinYears.description: The minimum number of years a patient must have records recorded in in order for their year data to be saved.

Separator.description: The separator between the codes in the flat file.
